name: Word trainer
description: Meet this whole new word trainer!  This new word trainer is not like all the other word trainers. You are able to add your own word lists, as for example: English  English, German  Russian et cetera. When you have added a list, you will be able to add this list to a folder. You can create these folders by yourself, so you can add your lists to different categories. Categorizing your lists is ideal if you want to practice any language seriously!  You will also find exercises in your personal folders. These exercises will help you to practice your chosen foreign language. There are eight exercises available. Audio is available for most languages, so you will be able to practice your listening skills and speaking skills as well! You will also practice your writing skills and your reading skills. This is an incredible way to expand your vocabulary!  This application is ideal for anyone who wants to learn a foreign language. You can use this application anywhere, because its all offline. Are you waiting for your bus? Then you will have some time to grab your smartphone and practice! Its easy to use this application, so its simply download and play!  We are sure that, by using our word trainer, you will have fun learning that language you always wanted!  There is no audio available for some languages. However, most of the languages are supported with audio. If your language has no audio available, you will still be able to do three exercises. If your language is not in the supported languages list, you can still add the language by yourself.   We support the following languages: Afrikaans Albanian Arabic Armenian Azerbaijani Basque Belarusian Bengali Bosnian Bulgarian Catalan Cebuano Chichewa Chinese Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Esperanto Estonian Filipino Finnish French Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Haitian Creole Hausa Hebrew Hindi Hmong Hungarian Icelandic Igbo Indonesian Irish Italian Japanese Javanese Kannada Kazakh Khmer Korean Lao Latin Latvian Lithuanian Macedonian Malagasy Malay Malayalam Maltese Maori Marathi Mongolian Myanmar (Burmese) Nepali Norwegian Persian Polish Portuguese Punjabi Romanian Russian Serbian Sesotho Sinhala Slovak Slovenian Somali Spanish Sundanese Swahili Swedish Tajik Tamil Telugu Thai Turkish Ukrainian Urdu Uzbek Vietnamese Welsh Yiddish Yoruba Zulu
